info.title: Operate an unchecked checkbox in interaction mode

setupScript.name: moveFocusToAndUncheckFirstCheckbox
setupScript.description: sets focus on the checkbox and sets its state to unchecked

user: With focus on the 'All condiments' checkbox, change its state to 'mixed'.
instructions.raw: With focus on the 'All condiments' checkbox, change its state to 'mixed'.
instructions.mode: Verify the PC Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn off the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.

assertions.expectation: Change in state, to 'mixed', is conveyed
